name: 楊勝明
objective: The objective of this course is to learn the design and simulation of electric machine control systems. Contents include: (1) Modeling, control system design, and simulation of DC motor, servo motor and permanent magnet synchronous motor. (2) Motor speed and position estimator design and simulation. (3) Digital control and driver design and simulation. Matlab/Simulink software is used for simulations.
schedule:
1. introduction of Matlab/Simulink, DC Motor model
2. DC motor control
3. velocity and position control
4. velocity estimator design
5. mixed analog/digital control system simulation
6. digital control system design
7. 清明節
8. digital control system with velocity estimator
9. mid-term exam
10. IPM-PMSM motor model
11. current control for PMSM motors
12. feedforward in current controllers
13. PMSM vector, position, and velocity control
14. sinusoidal PWM and space vector PWM
15. model-based position estimation
16. sensorless control with model-based position estimation
17. project demonstration
18. Final exam.
scorePolicy:
Lab + Project: 40%
Mid-term exam: 30%
Final exam: 30%
materials:
1. Control System Design Guide, 3th Editions, George Ellis, Elsevier-Academic Press.全華圖書.
2. Permanent Magnet Synchronous and Brushless DC Motor Drives, by Ramu Krishnan, CRC Press 2010.
